phrs.translation: 人均收入；平均每人所得

sentences.sentence: Per capita income rose sharply last year.
They have the world's largest per capita income.
sentences.translation: 他们有世界上最高的人均收入。

sentences.sentence: Ethiopia has almost the lowest oil consumption per capita in the world.
sentences.translation: 埃塞俄比亚有几乎是世界上最低的人均石油消费。
